attributes.action: Provide additional mental health support for NHS staff during the pandemic
attributes.additional_details:
The NHS is at breaking point, it's not just about space but about staffing levels and how this situation is affecting our NHS staff. With this situation worsening in the UK there needs to be additional funding and support for mental health services, as this is common sense in a crisis to support the mental health of those dealing with the worst parts of the pandemic. 

The government must support the NHS in this in order to aid us getting out of this crisis and making sure all can cope.
attributes.background: I would like the government to make provisions for NHS staff, providing additional funding for a myriad of mental health support as the pandemic and rising deaths are taking a huge mental toll on our frontline NHS staff.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Fund free mental health treatment for key workers and NHS staff
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329764

Immediately fund local services to prevent mental health pandemic
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557313
